DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Bioresorbable Vascular Scaffold ( BVS ) implantation functionally insignificant coronary stenosis vulnerable plaque reduce incidence composite cardiovascular death , nonfatal myocardial infarction , unplanned rehospitalization due unstable angina compare optimal medical therapy alone .
DOC.brief_title: The Preventive Implantation Bioresorbable Vascular Scaffold Functionally Insignificant Stenosis With Vulnerable Plaque Characteristics
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year older Symptomatic asymptomatic coronary artery disease patient Patients least one stenosis FFR ( Fractional flow reserve ) > 0.80 meeting two follow 1 . IVUS MLA ( Intravascular ultrasound minimal luminal area ) < 4mm2 2 . IVUS plaque burden > 70 % 3 . Lipidrich plaque NIRS ( Intracoronary NearInfrared Spectroscopy ) ( define maxLCBI4mm > 315 ) 4 . TCFA ( thincap fibroatheroma ) define OCT ( fibrous cap thickness < 65µm arc > 90° ) VHIVUS≥10 % confluent NC > 30° abut lumen 3 consecutive slice ) 2 target vulnerable lesion Eligible percutaneous coronary intervention Absorb Bioresorbable Vascular Scaffold Willing able provide inform write consent Reference vessel diameter 2.754.0 Lesion length ≤ 40 Patients preferred treatment CABG ( Coronary artery bypass graft ) Stented lesion Bypass graft lesion The patient equal 3 target lesion 2 target lesion coronary territory Heavily calcify angulated lesion Bifurcation lesion require 2 stenting technique Contraindication plan discontinuation dual antiplatelet therapy within 1 year Life expectancy le 2 year Planned cardiac surgery plan major non cardiac surgery Woman breastfeeding , pregnant planning become pregnant course study
